column2: "An ARKS marches on their stomach, and when they come back tired after a hard day's work they want something tasty to fill up on!"
"But I want to prepare a meal that's as nutritious as it is delicious! So..."
"I'm going to need the meat of a Fang Banshee, a scale from the tail of a Dragon Ex and the core from a Tranmizer!"
"I think I can make a world-class meal out of those. Could you gather the ingredients for me?"
